summary: An Ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 2161 for the improvement of Eighteenth Avenue South from Hanford Street to Massachusetts Street, and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues; all in the City of Seattle, by laying water mains therein of proper dimensions and materials, together with such gates, tees, crosses, fire hydrants and other appurtenances necessary for the proper water service and fire protection of said district all in accordance with Resolution No. 2304 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, under Ordinance No. 21720, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund, and fixing a date for the issuance of bonds.
